title: Avoid duplicate git status fetch on cache miss (requestGitStatus vs StatusManager)
description: requestGitStatus does GetStatus then StatusManager.RequestRefresh, causing duplicate work on cache miss. Consolidate so only one fetch happens per refresh.

title: VTerm resize edge cases: zero dims, clamp cursor, ViewOffset after trim
description: Resize can set cursor to -1 when width/height == 0; ViewOffset not clamped after scrollback trim. Harden resize/trim edge cases.

title: Show agent activity indicator in dashboard for worktrees with running agents
Dashboard dirty filter: rebuild rows on GitStatusResult when filter enabled
description: When dirty filter is on, GitStatusResult updates cache but rows aren’t rebuilt. Rebuild rows on status updates so filtering stays accurate.

title: Fix lag when switching focus between stacked sidebar panes
description: Focus switch between vertically stacked sidebar panes is laggy when border styles/colors are used; replace focus border with lightweight focus gutter while keeping normal borders.

title: Surface file-watcher init failures (toast/log)
description: If fsnotify watcher fails to start, surface a user-visible warning so git status staleness isn't silent.

title: Allow terminal ESC sequences; add explicit escape hatch instead of global ESC capture
description: App globally intercepts ESC and returns to dashboard, breaking terminal apps that need ESC. Decide on explicit escape hatch (e.g., Ctrl+]) and allow ESC to reach PTY when focused.

title: Add +New button to each worktree to create nested worktree branching off that worktree
Agent doesn't open after selecting assistant from dialog
Reduce Claude Code flicker in terminal pane
Remove plain terminal
close_reason: Removed term agent from dialog options, config, and README

title: Can't do shift tab to toggle between modes in claude code
close_reason: Added KeyShiftTab handling in keyToBytes to send ESC[Z sequence to terminal

title: Add golangci-lint configuration
description: Create .golangci.yml with standard Go linters (gofmt, goimports, govet, errcheck, staticcheck, unused, gosimple). This is the Go equivalent of ESLint.

title: Deduplicate PTY key-to-bytes mapping for center/sidebar
description: Extract keyToBytes into shared helper to keep terminal input mappings consistent between center and sidebar.

title: Activate file watcher: hook callbacks + watch correct gitdir/index for worktrees
description: FileWatcher is created with nil callback and startFileWatcher is no-op. Hook onChanged to emit FileWatcherEvent and ensure worktree gitdir/index is actually watched.

title: Split sidebar horizontally with terminal tabs at bottom for running commands (e.g. webserver)
close_reason: Implemented sidebar terminal with 50/50 split, Ctrl+J/K navigation

title: Expand test coverage for core user stories and run tests in lint
Add GitHub Actions CI workflow
description: Create .github/workflows/ci.yml to run tests, linting, and build checks on every PR. Ensures code quality gates.

title: Can't copy and paste from the terminal section
close_reason: Implemented mouse-based text selection with clipboard copy

title: Top border line is cut off on all three panes
close_reason: Fixed padding calculation to properly account for border and help line

title: Make project name selectable to open agents on main branch (protected from deletion)
Add button to sync/merge from parent branch (main or parent worktree) and handle conflicts
Fix dashboard g/G hang: moveCursor(0) infinite loop on non-selectable rows
description: g/G use moveCursor(0); when current row is non-selectable, loop never advances. Ensure jumps land on selectable rows without delta==0 loops (e.g., new helper to find next selectable).

title: Add opencode as coding agent
Fix selection/copy/search handling for wide glyph continuation cells
description: Row-to-string, search, and selection should ignore width==0 continuation cells so wide glyphs aren’t duplicated as spaces. Add tests for selection/copy with CJK/emoji.

title: Fuzzy search when adding projects
description: Replace exact path input with fuzzy file/directory picker. Allow typing to filter, show suggestions, support ~ expansion, and browse filesystem interactively.

title: Wire interrupt handling to AgentConfig InterruptCount/Delay (sendInterrupt)
description: InterruptCount/Delay config is unused because ctrl+c is forwarded as a single byte. Wire sendInterrupt to key handling so agents (e.g., Claude) get multi-interrupt behavior.

title: Fix bottom-line flicker in center/dashboard panes
description: Ensure center and dashboard panes fully fill inner height so bottom line is always repainted; remove leftover stale ANSI fragments causing flicker.

title: Better landing page with animation and ASCII art
description: Improve the welcome screen with better ASCII logo, animations (typing effect, fade in), and clearer onboarding for new users.

title: Prune or wire unused config/APIs (LayoutConfig, GetAgentsForWorktree, SendText, CloseAllTabs)
description: LayoutConfig isn’t applied and some APIs are unused (GetAgentsForWorktree, SendText, CloseAllTabs). Either wire them up or remove to reduce dead code.

title: VTerm scroll ops: clamp n, respect scroll region in scrollback capture
description: scrollUp/Down/insert/delete don’t clamp n to scroll region and scrollback capture ignores partial regions. Clamp n and respect region boundaries.

title: Add fuzzy filtering when selecting an agent
Coalesce PTY updates for inactive tabs to reduce redraws
description: Background tabs still parse PTY output and trigger full Bubble Tea renders. Consider coalescing or deferring PTY flush/render for non-active tabs to reduce redraw load and perceived flicker when switching worktrees.

title: Fix terminal flickering during Claude Code output
description:
Terminal flickers during Claude Code streaming output, especially visible in embedded terminals.

## Root Cause
- Bubbletea renders full View() on every message, not batched
- No Synchronized Output mode 2026 support
- Full 3-pane recomposition every frame
- Generates excessive scroll events (Claude Code sees 4,000-6,700/sec)

## Current Mitigation
16ms PTY buffer in internal/ui/center/model.go (lines 430-460) batches output but doesn't prevent View() calls

## Related
- Claude Code issue #769, #1913 (same underlying problem, 700+ upvotes unfixed since March 2025)
- Bubbletea issue #1019 (Windows flickering)

## Proposed Fix
1. Implement Synchronized Output mode 2026 wrapping (CSI ? 2026 h/l)
   - Supported: iTerm2, Kitty, Wezterm, Alacritty 0.13+, Windows Terminal, Ghostty
2. Add dirty tracking to skip unchanged pane renders
3. Reduce render frequency to match flush frequency

## Files
- internal/ui/center/model.go - PTY buffering
- internal/app/app.go - Main View() composition
- internal/vterm/render.go - Terminal output
- cmd/amux/main.go - Bubbletea options

## References
- https://github.com/anthropics/claude-code/issues/769
- https://github.com/anthropics/claude-code/issues/1913
- https://gist.github.com/christianparpart/d8a62cc1ab659194337d73e399004036

title: Stop PTY read loop on close/EOF; avoid goroutine leak & stale tab slice
description: PTY reader continues polling after tab close/EOF and captures stale tab slice. Stop read loop on close/EOF and guard against closed tabs/worktrees to avoid goroutine leaks.
close_reason: Implemented TabID-based PTY tracking and stop-on-close logic

title: Add Makefile
description: Create Makefile with standard targets: build, test, lint, fmt. Standard entry point for contributors.

title: Set up CLAUDE.md and AGENTS.md
description: Create proper CLAUDE.md with project context, architecture, conventions. Update AGENTS.md with amux-specific guidance for AI agents working on the codebase.

title: Allow selecting changed files in sidebar to view diff in a new tab
VTerm wide/combining characters support (cell widths)
description: Wide/combining runes not supported; Cell.Width unused and rendering drifts. Add rune width handling and continuation cells.

title: Dialogs should be modal overlays instead of modifying layout
VTerm CSI sub-parameter parsing (colon) for SGR extended colors
description: CSI params with ':' (sub-params) are treated as non-numeric and coerce to 0. Add parsing for sub-parameters in SGR/extended colors.

title: Set up development guardrails (linting, type checks)
description: Add golangci-lint, go vet, staticcheck or similar tools. Consider pre-commit hooks and CI integration.
close_reason: Duplicate of amux-86v - covered by Makefile + golangci-lint

title: Add inbox button next to home that shows worktrees needing attention in a modal
Sidebar refresh: handle StatusRefreshed and update gitStatus
description: Sidebar refresh command returns StatusRefreshed but Update never applies it. Handle StatusRefreshed (or standardize on GitStatusResult) to update sidebar state.

title: Improve vterm rendering performance (line-level caching or diffing)
description: Add per-line render caching or diffing to avoid re-rendering entire screen on every flush; ensure ANSI state resets per line and measure perf with high-output agents.

title: Add ability to delete worktree and its branch from dashboard
close_reason: Not needed - delete worktree already works with 'd' key

title: Add tests for vterm parsing/scrolling/resize + dashboard cursor edge cases
description: No tests cover vterm parsing/scrolling/resize or dashboard cursor edge cases; add focused unit tests to lock behavior.

title: Integrate beads deeply with landing the plane workflow
description: Surface beads issues in the UI. Show ready work, blocked issues, session close checklist. Help ensure work is committed, synced, and pushed before ending sessions.

title: Hide main branch from worktree list to prevent accidental deletion and encourage feature branches
Add hot reload for development
description: Currently dev workflow requires: quit (q), rebuild (go build), run (./amux) every change. Add hot reload using air, watchexec, or similar to auto-rebuild and restart on file changes.

title: Add amp as coding agent
